System Requirements:
********************
- Operating system: Windows Vista / 7/8 / 8.1 / 10
- Processor: Intel Core i3 530 (AMD Phenom ? X4 925 or equivalent processor)
- Memory: 4 GB
- Hard disk space: 6 GB
- Video card: nVidia GeForce GTX 260 / ATI Radeon HD 4850 / Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better

Description:
************
Award-winning game series returns to its 20th anniversary with new features. The game PES 2016 presents a host of new and enhanced features that are sure to once again raise the bar among all the football games, and will preserve the title of "Best sports simulator." PES 2016 - The Official Video Game UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League and UEFA Super Cup. Celebrate the 20th anniversary of the series with the best football simulator ever. I love the past, to play for the future!

Features:
*********
League masters - completely redone, from the presentation to the management team.

The new night lighting and exterior styling of players due to the GPU Fox Engine.

Movement of people - 3 times more kinds of animations for players and goalkeepers.

Dynamic change of weather - at any point in the game may begin to rain.

Improved intelligence team - the behavior of individual players and the team as a whole is now much more reasonable.
